alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 1:11PM PST until December 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Wind gusts as high as 40 mph will cause widespread blowing and drifting with reduced visibility especially near the Nevada border. * WHERE...Southern half of Malheur County zone. * WHEN...From 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ this afternoon to 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
